TaxonIdentification.subgenus_authority: (H. Itô) R. M. Tryon & A. F. Tryon

place_of_publication.publication_title: H. Itô in Nakai & Honda, Nov. Fl. Jap.

treatment.description: Distinguished from other subgenera by the combination of seasonal leaves, narrow, long-creeping stems 1--3 mm diam., pinnate-pinnatifid blades with generally greatly reduced proximal pinnae (except Thelypteris simulata ), and veins meeting margin above the sinuses. x = 27, 32.
treatment.number_of_infrataxa: Species 1--3 are included in Parathelypteris by some workers (e.g., R. E. Holttum 1976).:
